ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Our zhong , Wylven, says Voyesbian and another of that goon s character got banned. Not sure true or not.
ygData.messageBody:
Our "zhong", Wylven, says Voyesbian and another of that goon's character
got banned. Not sure true or not.

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> Voy got banned? u mean banned from guild? or banned from EQ? rofl...
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Sereph
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 6:56 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] (no subject)
> 1. Not really
> 2. Nope, remember my parang and lunch fine?
> 3. Guk trip is from the night of 6th of August till 8th of
> August night
> 4. Nope, Zan has not set up my account yet
> 5. Yeah, we went Guk to scout a bit, got a collar of undead
> protection which I happily loot and run off with, Bracers of
> Woven Glass for Sat.
>
> Rping stuff that happen:
>
> I ganna sexually assulted in the game by Einan and Leshrec.
> Be ware of those 2 especially Lesh. 1st class pervert
>
> Yiyang is now the pet(depends on how you interpret it) of
> Leshrec who bought him for 200mana
>
> Einan has a boyfriend call Seoph.
>
> Trifrost invented EQ viagra.
>
> Voyesbian the flat chested dark elf lesbian got her
> character baned.
>

>
> > so whats the decision guys? need to know the
